thread.title: SurfStich Extends Successful XBOSoft Software Testing and Quality Assurance Partnership
thread.title_full: SurfStich Extends Successful XBOSoft Software Testing and Quality Assurance Partnership

author: Karla Smith
title: SurfStich Extends Successful XBOSoft Software Testing and Quality Assurance Partnership
text:
SurfStitch, the Australia-based online retailer and world’s largest online retailer of action sports and youth apparel, has extended its XBOSoft software testing partnership, ensuring a consistently high quality experience for customers around the globe. The two companies first began working together in June 2014. Bringing a passion for surfing and the out-of-doors to life for consumers world-wide, SurfStitch is home to over 20,000 products and 600 brands and is recognized for superior customer service as well as the quality and diversity of its product. With operations in Australia, Europe and the US, the level of demand for product has continued to grow. By employing Agile collaboration, deep expertise and quick regression turn-arounds, XBOSoft has helped SurfStitch meet the challenge of balancing increasing demand while continuing to expand an engaging and accessible retail and destination site platform.
"We've continued to increase the functionality of our platform and improve the overall SurfStitch customer experience. XBOSoft's responsiveness and close collaboration with our development team supports us in quickly responding to customer needs with new features and product promotions,” stated David Dennings, General Manager, Platform & Technology at SurfStitch.
"We’re excited and proud that SurfStitch has renewed our contract as their quality assurance provider,” said Philip Lew, CEO of XBOSoft. “The confidence they place in our ability to support SurfStitch in their significant growth as a market leader speaks to our expertise – and our software testing services in turn help to ensure their continued growth and position as a leader in unique consumer experiences and customer satisfaction.”
About SurfStitch
SurfStitch was launched out of a garage on Sydney’s Northern Beach by founders Justin Cameron and Lex Pedersen in 2007. Since that time, the company has grown to become Australia’s largest online retailer and the world’s largest online action sports and youth apparel retailer, with operations in Australia, the UK and America. Committed to customer service that provides shoppers with the highest quality, unique and up-to-date products the fashion industry has to offer, SurfStitch has been awarded the Best Pure-Play Online Retailer, the Best Use of Technology award, the ORIA for Online Retailer of the Year and awards for Best Pure-Play Online Retailer and Best Site Optimization and Design. For more visit http://www.surfstitch.com/
About XBOSoft
XBOSoft is a software testing and QA company. Their quality process assessments and test methodologies speed products to market and improve our clients’ software quality and performance throughout the lifecycle. With QA services in web, mobile and desktop applications, the company offers broad domain experience with extended expertise in healthcare and finance.
Founded in 2006, XBOSoft today has over 100 employees serving both the US and European markets, with offices based in San Francisco, Beijing and Amsterdam. For more visit http://xbosoft.com/
